text: singappuru - shri lanka welada giwisumen meratata aanayanaya kerena bhanda athara ilektronika apadrawya, wikiranashili apadrawya, nyashtika apadawya

nidahas adyapanaya pilibada kathawa 70-80 gananwala oba dutuwada adatath eya ee kalayata sema walanguya .ee eda menma adath eya nathikirimata dagalana (samaharun nidahas adyapanayen ma igenagena eya amathaka wu udata nagapu inimagata payin gasana chathiye)aathmarthakami boho denek sitina bawini.
ehi dewana ha thewana sthana piliwelin kagalla santha josap balika widyalaye si. es. bandara saha ambaagamuwa maha widyalaye ke.
kohomath mage idiri anagathaya boho wita kalawath ekka randewi.
kalayak thisse awasan tharangawalata walata aapu kridakayin gana anawaki kiwa..
7 ethumange raja balaya wadi wardhanaya wanne ya;
ee mani walin sarthakawa salli hoyann nam job ekak karana ha samana ho eyatath wadi danumak saha kapawimak awashyayi.
kese wuwath awasanaye ehi prathipalaya wuye therim tharagawaliyedi sudusukam labagath kridakayan dedenakuta saha kridikawakata loka mesapandu shurathawaliyata sahabhagiwime awasthawa ahimi wimayi.

mama buru nada pawathwuwa.
matath ooka welawakata gataluwak...
uu mage iwata pissuwen wage hitiye.

me sindu yanawita gayikawa ena hati, indaganna hati, gayanaya karana hati mama hithin mawa gannawa.
edinada ohu wenada menma thora thonchiyak nathiwa kiyawannata patangaththeya ..
owun dedenata amatharawa aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha saha amathi basil rajapaksha da yuda aparadhakaruwan lesa namkara thibini.
menna me nisa, sanskruthin hatharakin ena anga ekata ekkasu wela thiyenawa.
me kalpanawe hari waradi kese wethath ee aya ehema sithana bawa nam sabaya.

ese adu kirimen wipathata pathwuwan wenuwen dariya yuthu wiyadam awama kara ganimata da aanduwa balaporoththu wana bawa owunage adahasa wiya.

kese wuwada ema saparidhi aparadhayata lakwuwanda athulathwa athurudanwa sitina pudgalayan miyagiyawun lesa salaka owunge gnyathinta marana sahathika dimata kriyakarana bawata janadhipathiwaraya eksath jathinge nithya niyojithawariyata danwa thibuni.

aarthikayata balapana ayahapath thaththwayaki. 2018 sinhala ha demala aluth awurudde athdakim padanam karagena labana wasaratawath nawa wada piliwelak gana hithannata wagakiwa yuthu ansha awadhanayata gatha yuthuya.

namuth peradiga darshanaye ehema naha.
kokatath mama eewath dennam.
thaman mahaluwiyata pathwimath samanga pinakdahamak karanna sudanam wu demapiyangen kiyen kidenada thama daruwan ema dahami margayata yomu karanna katayuthu kale?,

"this wasarakata pasu pera bhawaya soya giya kanishka miyagiya aakaraya"
galla karapitiya shikshana rohale waidyawariyak dengu rogaya waladimen miya gos thibe.

eksath arabi emir rajyaye nithirithiwalata anuwa nila danumdimak labadena thuru ee sambandhayen adhyayanayaka niratha wana bawath ee sandaha widesha katayuthu amathyanshayeda sahayogaya labena bawath ohu kiya sitiyeya.
ewita mema mishranaya unu rogin nosithu eya bara diya yuthu ya.

nathnam oluwa galakawath wadilada.
deshapalana pakshawalath ehemayi.
boho prasangawalata mamath yanawa.

yapanaya disthrikkaye janathawage methek nowisandunu gatalu wisandima sandaha swadesha katayuthu amathyanshaye meheyawimen pawathwanu labana nila mehewara wadasatahana aarambha kirime palamu piyawara washayen kshethra niladharin geyin geta gos janatha gatalu eekarashi kara thibini.

mese senpokayata maraugula atawapiyannath ha samangama madamulani brahmadaththa rajjuruwanda,uuruwanshayada,asu kelak mugdha amathi mandalayada mahath garwayen handasiti deshapremaya namathi saluwa gilihi un amage seluwa penennata patangathhayi dathayuthuya.

wasarin wasara niwes thula, kunu godawal thula pare thote, ganga ala dolawal thula ekathu wena bhawitha kara iwath kala "si.ef.el." balba walata kala yuthu de, noesenam eewa parisara hithakami lesa bahara karanne kese dayi eewa alewi karannan ho baladhariyeku apata kiya nodena bawin wathman samajaya madi nokiyanna athwindina parisarika ha saukhya gatalu walata amatharawa thawath gataluwak bawata "si.ef.el." balba path wannata perathuwa me pilibadawa awadhanaya yomu kirima manawayi sithami.
ihatha sandahan karunu wiwechanayata lak kirima, nawa deshapalana sanskruthiyak apa athara godananwimata athyawashya bawa mage yojanawayi.

ihatha shuddha wu kuraan wakyayan 03 anuwa thawath dahamak, darshanayak ho mathawadayakata erehiwa banawadimata ho apahasayan sidukirimata muslimwarayekuta islam dahama thula awasara nathuwasema elesa simawan ikmawa kriya karana (islam wirodhi) pirisa sambandhayen da itha saradharnawa katayuthu kalayuthuyi yanna islam dahame igenwimayi.

rate batha sari karalannatata iwahal wana‘chandana pokuna’ wawa pirisudu kirima ha aluthwadiya katayuthu ‘pibidemu polonnaruwa’ wyapruthiyata samagamiwa siwil aarakshaka departhamenthu samajikayan samanga yuddha hamuda samajikayan 250kata adhika pirisak wisin sidu karana ladi.

1) prashnaya: sahana sanwidhanaya kiyanne mokadda aththatama?

mahacharya hemamali perera ese kiyana wita kada watuna hitha ma esanin yali pilisakara kara gaththeya.ee wana witath ma dath de nomilema anuruddha balika wani pasal diyaniyanta menma wiwidha than hi awadhanaya yomu nowu puthunta beda demin unneya.rate krida keshthrey wathman prabalayan wenuwen aragala karamin satan wadiimin ada apa widina warthamana dakshayan rasak nirmanaya kirima wenuwen pana meheyawamin sitiyeya.

jaya shri masika dinum adimata athulathwima sandaha ihatha sandahan kala aakarayata oonama ginumaka rupiyal 10,000 ka sheshayak pawathwagena ya yuthu athara warsha awasana maha dinum adima sandaha rupiyal 50,000/} ka awama sheshayak 2012 nowambar masa 30 dinata pera thanpath kara pawathwagena ya yuthuya.

dhiwara karmanthaya kerehi nawa thakshanaya ketharam balapam kalada pila oru dhiwarayanta eya etharam gataluwak nowe.dhiwara karmanthaye ek pathikadak niyojanaya karana pila oru dhiwarayath, dhiwara gatalu kerehith baladharinge awadhanaya yomu nowima nisa ema dhiwarayo asiruwata pathwa sitithi.kaluthara katukurunda, payagala, kalamulla, maggona pradeshawala pila oru dhiwarayo da jiwanopaya pilibanda gatalu rasakin pida windithi.
balanna oya dekama...
kalaguna wipath sambandha jathyanthara sammuthi anuwa ka්riya karannata sudanam wana sha්ri lankawa ee sandaha jathika salasmak anugamanaya kirima wadagathya.

henri jayasena mahatha ada dina dakunu kolambaa shikshana rohaledi abhawapraptha wiya.1931 juli 6 wana dina gampaha bandiyamulledi upatha labu henri jayasena mahatha gampaha lorans widyalayen ha kolambaa nalanda widyalayen adhyapanaya labiya.gamperaliye "piyal", hunuwataye kathawe "asadak" ha du daruwohi "sudu siya" ohu nirupanaya kala pradhana charitha wiya.minisun wu daruwo(1965), karaliyaka kathawak(1995), nimnathi kathawak 1(1996), nimnathi kathawak 2(1996) ha lasaras(1999) ohu rachana kala nawakatha weyi.janelaya(1964), kuweni(1964), thawath udasanak(1964), hunuwataye kathawa(pariwarthanaya-1967), apata puthe mahak nathe(1968), diriya mawa ha age daruwo(pariwarthanaya-1972), makara(pariwarthanaya-1972), dew lowa giya shishya bhatayo(1991) ohu nirmanaya kala natya nirmana weyi.hithata hithena kawi sindu(1972) ha kathandare hangila(1979) ohu rachana kala lama sahithya grantha weyi.gahanu gata(1959), shri 296(1959), gamperaliya(1963), wena swargayak kumatada(1963), suhada sohoyuro(1963), heta pramada wadi(1964), dahasak sithuwili(1968), hansawilak(1980), baddegama(1981), soldadu unnahe(1981), kaliyugaya(1983), ammayi duwayi(1984), sadakada pahana(1988) henri jayasena mahatha ragapa chithrapati weyi.henri jayasena mahathaneni, obata niwan suwa labewa!!!!!
